root: ^ I see you're collecting Heat Sinks. Want to know more about it?

c-0: ^In order to gather the materials here which is the Heat Sink, you need to defeat the enemies here.
^The Heat Sink of a CPU fan is primarily made from materials that are excellent at conducting heat.
^These materials help absorb and disperse the heat generated by the CPU into the surrounding air, which the fan then expels.
^Materials of the Heat Sink can be either Aluminum, Copper, or a combination of both.
^Aluminum and copper are the two dominant materials, with copper used for its superior heat transfer capabilities and aluminum for its lightweight and cost-effective properties.
^I also approve these options as you can opt out to either a cost-effective or to a more expensive yet superior Heat Sink to the other.
^Anyway, I appreciate you listening to me about Heat Sink. Be safe mate.
